de.hsaugsburg.games.boardgames
Class Square<P,D>

java.lang.Object
  de.hsaugsburg.games.boardgames.Square<P,D>
Type Parameters:
P - type of the piece object
D - type of the details object
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Square<P,D>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Square is a generic base class that represents a field on a board game. It can store additional details i.e. for marking bonus fields as it can store a piece.

Author:
Marc Rochow, Anja Radtke
See Also:
